name: The Crash in Smog
description:
Tried to overtake in the haze days?
The game is set in the fog and haze of the highway, but you in order to escape the police chase, must overtake! But over time, the haze is more and more serious, the ability to successfully escape more depends on your intuition to judge. Thrilling, come and try!
By controlling the lower left button to avoid the road ahead of the vehicle, be careful not to end oh. Now you can crash 5 times, the game will end.

Email: rxgame@qq.com
